TopicTitle: I think I made the weirdest craft in KSP.

Articles.Content:
https://imgur.com/a/bFdZE

This wouldn't have been possible without Inter's Odyssey's "biplane with stock propeller substitute" video.

The plane also goes faster than mach 1 speeds in a straight line.

It's not that weird...

CupCakeLanders uses those inline storage bay things as cockpits all the time. Wheesley's in reverse thrust mode make great nose mounted engines, if you like having the engine thrust clouds in your face as you fly.
This might be a bit weirder.
It could be alot weirder, if you have the wings in an odd place then you could make it alot weirder.
Well, I haven't seen that many weird craft. I made two of them. However, I think I ditched that save file.
